title: Glary Utilities Pro 5.1.0.4 Final
description:
Glary Utilities Pro 5.1.0.4 Final

Glary Utilities Pro - functional set of system tweakers and utilities  improve overall performance and protect your PC. This application allows the user to get rid of unnecessary files from legacy records and history of Internet activity, by setting different plugins, you can achieve full compatibility of this application with more than 45 different programs. Furthermore, Glary Utilities optimizes the use of system memory, searches, and fix or remove broken shortcuts, edit the list of programs to be loaded with the operating system, and remove these applications. 

Provides a one-stop solution for PC performance optimization
Boosts PC speed and fixes frustrating errors, crashes and freezes
Features one-click functionality and easy, automated options
Protects your privacy and makes your computer faster and cleaner

For activation use Serial.txt
